izzy.classification.aic¶

izzy.classification.aic(log_likelihood, degrees_of_freedom)[source]¶

Compute the Akaike Information Criteria (AIC)

This function penalizes the log likelihood \(L\) by the degrees of freedom \(D\). Specifically,

\[AIC = -2L + 2D\]
Parameters

  • log_likelihood (int or float) – The log likelihood

  • degrees_of_freedom (int or float) – The degrees of freedom

Returns

AIC

Return type

float

Previous topic

izzy.classification.accuracy

Next topic

izzy.classification.bic
